headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 3X GTA$ and RP on Freemode Challenges
content: Keep an eye out for Freemode Challenges firing regularly in GTA Online throughout the day. These unique challenges pit players in Freemode against each other in all sorts of various trials, such as the Longest Wheelie Challenge, Vehicles Stolen Challenge, and more. Earn 3X GTA$ and RP for taking part until April 14th.
